name: Pokémon API
description: Demonstrates use of use of API calls and data manipulation with jQuery.

name: Ultimate Budgeter
description: Demonstrates use of frontend with jQuery and built a backend simple server with Node.js, Express.js, and simple database with mongoDB
Budget application geared towards low budget users needing to focus money management

name: Your Personal Menu
description: Demonstrates use of React and Redux in the front end. Built a backend server with Node.js, Express.js, and a database with mongoDB

Application to store all your recipes from your magazines, pinterest, and those handed down in the family all in one central database. Enter as recipe, view in a menu format with categories. Select item to view as recipe, select missing ingredients you need to add to your grocery list.

name: Adhesives Specialists
description: Redesigned previous employers’ website (From Wix to React) to be responsive with an updated modern website look.

name: React Search Engine Results Page
description: Demonstrates use of a responsive react video player. Dynamic routing. Demonstrates use of API calls, data querying and data manipulation in a React app.

name: Profile App
description: Simple profile app which allows you to upload a picture and change your nickname. Demonstrates the use of running a bash script, storing images in AWS s3, and authentication.

name: Weather API
description: Demonstrates Use of API calls and data manipulation in a React app.

name: HackerNews API
description: Demonstrates use of API calls, data querying and data manipulation in a React app. What's different about this API app, HackerNews partnered with FireBase and put out a free API that was a bit trickier. In their word's 'is essentially a dump of our in-memory data structures,' which meant solving multiple calls and pagination involved.

name: Spotify API
description: Demonstrates use of API calls. Multiple calls, drilling down several layers of API's. Dealt with API authorization tokens as well.

name: YouTube API
description: Demonstrates use of API calls from the server. Pagination. Dynamic routing. Responsive video player.

name: Contact Form AWS
description: Allows user to send a message demonstrates use of AWS through an API Gateway, Lambda function, DynamoDB, Material UI
